info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 1:32PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Millard...southwestern Sevier and northeastern Beaver Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 131 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Cove Fort, or 15 miles northeast of Milford, moving east at 20 mph. Additional strong thunderstorms are located across eastern Millard and Beaver Counties. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cove Fort. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 127 and 150. Interstate 70 between mile markers 0 and 13, and between mile markers 17 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
